summary: An attractive pair agrees to be each other's supposed significant other throughout the holidays to keep their meddling families at bay.
cast: Joey Lawrence|Emily Hampshire|Linda Darlow|Marilu Henner|Serge Houde|L. Harvey Gold|Paula Shaw|Chris Gauthier|Christina Sicoli|Lisa Durupt|Kevin O'Grady|Rob LaBelle|Colin Lawrence|Alison Wandzura|Richard Keats|Joe Costa|Cam Cronin|Tobias Slezak|David Milchard|Tony Ali|Simon Chin|Mark McConchie|Reg Tupper|Arthur Corber|Clay St. Thomas|Marina DeVeiteo|Barry Ostash
title: Busco pareja por Navidad
